question: [Challenge] Italiano: Comunica which category has the highest bar dal grafico a barre.

qas.question: [Challenge] Italiano: Comunica which category has the highest bar dal grafico a barre.
[Brief] Portugues: Apresente which category has the lowest bar do grafico de barras.
[Calm] Francais: Donnez what is the difference between the tallest and shortest bars depuis le diagramme en barres.
